mapper.select: SELECT( SELECT SUM(i.lytotal) FROM( SELECT SUM(ly.weight1+ly.weight2+ly.weight3+ly.weight4+ly.weight5+ ly.weight6+ly.weight7+ly.weight8+ly.weight9) AS lytotal FROM hl_ly_recycler_child ly UNION ALL SELECT SUM(e.weight1+e.weight2+e.weight3+e.weight4+e.weight5+ e.weight6+e.weight7+e.weight8+e.weight9) as lytotal FROM hl_elescale_child e UNION ALL SELECT SUM(lj.clothes_weight) AS lytotal FROM hl_lj_recycler_child lj ) i )as recyle_num, (SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM hl_express_find a) as express_num, (SELECT COUNT(u.id) FROM hl_user u) as userreg_num, (SELECT SUM(h.real_amount) FROM hl_hypay h) as life_num, (SELECT COUNT(sc.id) FROM hl_service_cust sc) as conve_num

SELECT SUM(i.lytotal) as num_int1,i.date_str FROM( SELECT SUM(ly.weight1+ly.weight2+ly.weight3+ly.weight4+ly.weight5+ ly.weight6+ly.weight7+ly.weight8+ly.weight9) AS lytotal, DATE_FORMAT(ly.flush_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as date_str FROM hl_ly_recycler_child ly WHERE ly.flush_time >= #{startTime} and ly.flush_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ly.flush_time,'%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL SELECT SUM(e.weight1+e.weight2+e.weight3+e.weight4+e.weight5+ e.weight6+e.weight7+e.weight8+e.weight9) as lytotal, DATE_FORMAT(e.flush_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as date_str FROM hl_elescale_child e WHERE e.flush_time >= #{startTime} and e.flush_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(e.flush_time,'%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL SELECT SUM(lj.clothes_weight) AS lytotal, DATE_FORMAT(lj.flush_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as date_str FROM hl_lj_recycler_child lj WHERE lj.flush_time >= #{startTime} and lj.flush_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(lj.flush_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ) i GROUP BY i.date_str ORDER BY i.date_str asc

SELECT SUM(i.lytotal) as num_int1,i.date_str FROM( SELECT SUM(ly.weight1+ly.weight2+ly.weight3+ly.weight4+ly.weight5+ ly.weight6+ly.weight7+ly.weight8+ly.weight9) AS lytotal, DATE_FORMAT(flush_time,'%Y-%m') as date_str FROM hl_ly_recycler_child ly WHERE ly.flush_time >= #{startTime} and ly.flush_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ly.flush_time,'%Y-%m') UNION ALL SELECT SUM(e.weight1+e.weight2+e.weight3+e.weight4+e.weight5+ e.weight6+e.weight7+e.weight8+e.weight9) as lytotal, DATE_FORMAT(e.flush_time,'%Y-%m') as date_str FROM hl_elescale_child e WHERE e.flush_time >= #{startTime} and e.flush_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(e.flush_time,'%Y-%m') UNION ALL SELECT SUM(lj.clothes_weight) AS lytotal, DATE_FORMAT(lj.flush_time,'%Y-%m') as date_str FROM hl_lj_recycler_child lj WHERE lj.flush_time >= #{startTime} and lj.flush_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(lj.flush_time,'%Y-%m') ) i GROUP BY i.date_str ORDER BY i.date_str asc

select a.date_str, SUM(a.shuifei) as num_dou1, SUM(a.dianfei)as num_dou2, SUM(a.qifei) as num_dou3 FROM ( select DATE_FORMAT(pay_time,'%Y-%m') as date_str, sum(real_amount) as 'shuifei',0 as 'dianfei',0 as 'qifei' from hl_hypay where project_id='c2670' and pay_time >= #{startTime} and pay_time < #{endTime} group by DATE_FORMAT(pay_time,'%Y-%m') UNION ALL select DATE_FORMAT(pay_time,'%Y-%m') as date_str, 0 as 'shuifei',sum(real_amount) as 'dianfei',0 as 'qifei' from hl_hypay where project_id='c2680' and pay_time >= #{startTime} and pay_time < #{endTime} group by DATE_FORMAT(pay_time,'%Y-%m') UNION ALL select DATE_FORMAT(pay_time,'%Y-%m') as date_str, 0 as 'shuifei',0 as 'dianfei',sum(real_amount) as 'qifei' from hl_hypay where project_id='c2681' and pay_time >= #{startTime} and pay_time < #{endTime} group by DATE_FORMAT(pay_time,'%Y-%m') ) a group by a.date_str order by a.date_str asc
